main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were reported in the skies during various observations between May 2-4, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed both visually and by radar, with reports of fast-moving formations and unusual maneuverability,At one point, the observation lasted for about 7 hours and 24 minutes,The objects were described as being very high in the atmosphere,Estimated speeds reached approximately 670 miles per hour,Some witnesses noted the objects did not resemble any known aircraft.
witness description: observers included various individuals with experience and military backgrounds
